In supersession of this Bureau Circular No. 12/2002 dated 1% May, 2002 the
following VVIPs / VIPs are exempted from pre-embarkation security checks at civil
airports in the country.

President

Vice President.

Prime Minister.

Former Presidents.

Speaker of Lok Sabha.

. Chief Justice of India.

. Judges of Supreme Court.

Union Ministers of Cabinet Rank.

. Governors of States.

12. Ambassadors of foreign countries, Charge D Affairs and high Commissioners and

13, Cabinet Secretary.

14. Visiting foreign dignitaries of the same status as at SJ. No. 1 to 3,5,6,8 to 10

16. SPG Protectees,

Sen ayeene

It is reiterated that except the categories specified above all their categories of
passengers traveling by air through the civilian airports in the country are to be subjected
to pre-embarkation security checks without making any exception in the particular case.
